channel.title: CVE Feed for Hiroaki Miyashita -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hiroaki Miyashita -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-38392|2023-08-07T12:45:24.226Z -- hiroaki%20miyashita -- custom%20field%20template
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Hiroaki Miyashita Custom Field Template plugin <= 2.5.9 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-22695|2023-07-10T12:38:52.614Z -- hiroaki%20miyashita -- custom%20field%20template
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Hiroaki Miyashita Custom Field Template plugin <= 2.5.8 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-50372|2023-12-18T10:15:28.593Z -- hiroaki%20miyashita -- custom%20post%20type%20page%20template
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Hiroaki Miyashita Custom Post Type Page Template.This issue affects Custom Post Type Page Template: from n/a through 1.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-25919|2024-06-07T19:31:36.307Z -- hiroaki%20miyashita -- custom%20field%20template
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Hiroaki Miyashita Custom Field Template allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Custom Field Template: from n/a through 2.6.
